main.name: Thabo Mponya's Portfolio
main.description: I am a software developer and I use react to develop websites and web applications. I developed this portfolio website using React. I also develop Mobile Applications using Flutter, RESTful API services using Django and sometimes Firebase
main.bio: Passionate software developer, experienced in Java, Python, and C#. I have been learning and practising JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Flutter, Django, and ReactJS through online courses from Udemy since April 2020 and I am currently enrolled in Cisco's DevNet course. Other programming languages I know include C/C++. I am also very interested in information security, I am aiming to get the IBM Cybersecurity certificate. I am a Linux enthusiast Linux, I have been using Ubuntu since 2018.
main.contactmessage: Leave a message here if you want to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I have more than a years experience with Java, Python, SQL, C#, and Flutter. However since the beginning of August 2020 I have been developing web applications with ReactJS and Django. I am also experienced with GitHub and Heroku and my ideal Operating System is Ubuntu Linux

education.description: At school I spent a lot of time practicing Object Orient Programming. I have been part of a group that went to the Standard Bank Tech Impact Hackathon in 2018.

education.degree: I studied pure Mathematics and Physical Sciences
education.description: In High school I participated a lot in the Escom Science Expo, and in 2015 I won a 3rd place medal at the Regional finals.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: I worked in developing websites for clients that requested websites from the company. So far I developed a website for a modelling academy and I am currently finishing off an E-commerce site for a customer.
